title: Cisco Secure Client VPN Connection Insights
description: This dashboard provides visibility into Cisco Secure Client (AnyConnect) VPN connections, highlighting session activity, failures, user behavior, and connection trends to support monitoring and troubleshooting.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides visibility into Cisco Secure Client (AnyConnect) VPN connections, highlighting session activity, failures, user behavior, and connection trends to support monitoring and troubleshooting.

For more information, see the [Cisco Secure Client Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cisco_secure_client/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Provides a comprehensive view of VPN activity from Cisco Meraki, including connection and disconnection events, authentication successes and failures, session types, tunnel creation and deletion, and client IPs. Helps monitor usage trends, detect anomalies, troubleshoot issues, and ensure secure and reliable VPN access for users.

definition.title: VPN connections vs disconnections over time
Top IPs with failed authentication attempts
Distribution of events by session types

search.query: source:cisco-secure-client @evt.name:"VPN Session Manager" @action:("Deleted TLS tunnel" OR "Deleted DTLS tunnel" OR "Added DTLS tunnel" OR "Added TLS tunnel") $event_type $status $client_ip $user_name

definition.content: Provides visibility into session activity, including connections, failures, users, associated IP addresses, client connection details, SVC images, and DAP information from Cisco FTD and ASA firewalls.

search.query: source:cisco-secure-client @message_id:(113035 OR 716060 OR 722056 OR 716061 OR 751020 OR 722054 OR 113038 OR 751005) $user_name $client_ip $message_id $status

definition.title: Session failure vs connections over time
